description.value:
School transmutation; Level alchemist 1, druid 1, hunter 1, magus 1, psychic 1, shaman 1, sorcerer/wizard 1;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range personal
Targets you
Duration 1 minute/level (D)

Description

Your hands and feet alter to make you better at climbing and swimming. You gain a 10 foot climb speed and swim speed. This spell has no effect if you are wearing medium or heavy armor or carrying a medium or heavy load.

data.shortDescription: Your hands and feet alter to make you better at climbing and swimming. You gain a 10 foot climb speed and swim speed. This spell has no effect if you are wearing medium or heavy armor or carrying a medium or heavy load.
